p.s: In this extract of the report written by an 18-year-old German woman, who volunteered in an Education Center in a slum of Delhi in India, the germanGerman volunteer Bianca L. talks about her daily routine and her experiences in teaching young indianIndian children englishEnglish grammar.
Bianca L. teaches englishEnglish grammar to boys and girls devidedivide each once a day.
She makes it clear that it is very fulfilling to work with these poor Indian children, since they are supposed to be very kind and curious.
It's safe to say that Bianca L. enjoyed this experience greatly.
